description:

This is what some of our Fans are saying about Cricket Career 2015 - T20 Edition

In game Voice commentary with Kris Srikkanth with the new update.
Have you ever dreamed of becoming a cricket super star?
Do you have it in you to become the next legend of T-20 cricket?
Now Kris Srikkanth's voice commentary to enhance your Cricket experience.
Cricket career 2015 will take you on a journey in cricket that you have never experienced before.
Take on the role of a young cricketer ready to make his mark in T-20 cricket in the Indian T-20 league. You start your cricket journey as an upcoming batsman ready to take the fight to the opposition.
Create your own 3d avatar and take on the world’s deadliest bowlers in next gen 3d graphics with beautiful cut scenes.
Please note: Cricket career 2015 is memory intensive application and thus there will be a dip in performance in older devices such as iPhone 4, 4s and IPad.
Start from scratch and earn respect from your team mates and dazzle the crowd with your skills to become the next cricket super star.
Negotiate with your favorite teams and take on the opposition to bring in the championship. Play in over 9 international stadiums and score runs and move on to the top of the cricket world.
Take control of your career, attract sponsors and become a part of the rich and famous.
Buy properties, cars and manage your relationships to become the next superstar in the world of t-20 cricket.

Game Highlights
• Next gen 3d graphics
• Beautiful Cut scenes
• Realistic cricket simulation never seen before on phones and tablets
• Over 30 authentic motion captured batting strokes
• Live in game match commentary with former Indian cricket captain Kris Srikkanth
• Over 60 achievements that will make you the king of the cricket world
• Challenge friends and family and get on to the top of the leader boards
Try it now and experience the thrill of becoming the next cricket super star.

We have planned a massive list of features that will be added on to cricket career as updates. Please feel free to like us on Facebook and consider following us on twitter. Join our team at criccareer.com to become a part of us and help us make cricket career the best cricket game.
